筀字的基本解释

筀
guì
古书上说的一种竹。

筀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guì］
［《廣韻》古惠切，去霽，見。］
竹名。

筀字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　筀； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页882第04
【廣韻】古惠切【集韻】【韻會】涓惠切，?音桂。竹名。【山海經】龜山又東七十里曰丙山，多筀竹。【僧贊寧·筍譜】筀竹，吳越多生。【篇海】筀，竹名，傷人則死。【廣東新語】筀竹，葉細節疎，宜作蔤絲。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo characters department] 　筀; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 882 04
[Guangyun] Gu Huiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Juan Huiqie,? Yingui. Bamboo name. [Shanhaijing] Guishan is seventy miles east of Guishan called Bingshan, with many bamboos. [Monk Zanning·Branch of Bamboo Shoots] Yunzhu, Wu Yue was born. 【Pianhai】Yang, bamboo name, hurts and dies. [Cantonese New Language] Bamboo, with fine details of leaves, suitable for silk.
